content: pretty lacy mittens in a simple shell pattern made in the round with thumb added sooooo soft and stretchy one of my all time favourite wools the beautiful drops alpaca 4/5 ply in loads of gorgeous colours and fab value from garnstudio the multicolour mittens are made in drops delight they use only one ball and the only sewing is to hide your ends the pattern includes options for making smaller or bigger mitts and can easily be adapted to dk or even aran weight yarn i can t stop making these pattern download updated 1st jan 2015 thumb instructions amended to show a turn at end of round 2 after the last shell & slip_stitch into 3rd chain then slip_stitch over 3 treble_crochet at beginning of round 3
